data.actual_result: After a short period of time, Pictures will overlap each other creating a mess of Pictures.
data.expected_result: The pictures will scroll through and not overlap
data.short_description: [Marketing] In partners page users profiles start to overlap each other after leaving the page open for a short time
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up the Partners marketing page.  ./partners - Wait for a little time for the pictures at the top to start to scroll through.
